SENT.plain: Complex aortic dissections with subsequent dilatation may be managed by using a visceral hybrid approach
In some cases, however, there is substantial retrograde blood flow into the false lumen, leaving a pressurized aneurysmal segment
The authors describe a novel treatment method whereby successful seal of a distal type 1 endoleak was achieved with coil embolization and a liquid injectable embolic agent
The patient was followed up for 2 years without further aortic dilatation or complications
